text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:14pt; font-weight:normal; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#333333;

link.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:8pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Eine wichtige Funktion von sPlan ist die Erstellung von Stücklisten. Diese werden bei Bedarf von der Software vollautomatisch erstellt. Sie können die Stückliste anschließend noch beliebig von Hand editieren, ausdrucken, laden oder speichern.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Zum Erstellen einer Stückliste wählen Sie den Befehl

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: oder Sie klicken auf den entsprechenden Knopf in der Toolbar. Daraufhin erscheint folgendes Fenster:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Hier wählen Sie aus, über welche Blätter sich die Stückliste erstrecken soll. Nachdem Sie diese Angaben bestätigt haben, erscheint die Stückliste:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Innerhalb des Stücklistenfensters können Sie die Stückliste beliebig editieren. Zusätzlich haben Sie hier noch folgende Optionen:

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Hier können Sie die Schriftart und die Schriftgröße der Stückliste einstellen.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Mit dieser Option werden verschiedene Zusatzangaben in die Stückliste mit aufgenommen:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-24px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:24px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Arial Unicode MS'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-24px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:24px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Arial Unicode MS'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-24px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:24px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Arial Unicode MS'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Namen der einzelnen Blätter für die Stückliste

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Diese Daten werden ganz oben in die Stückliste eingefügt.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:italic; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Bitte beachten Sie, dass bei einer Änderung dieser Option die Stückliste komplett neu erstellt wird. Eventuelle Änderungen, die Sie von Hand gemacht haben gehen dabei verloren.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Wenn Sie diese Option aktivieren werden automatisch alle Bauteile, mit einem gleichen Wert zu einem Eintrag in der Stückliste zusammengefasst.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Damit kann die Übersichtlichkeit der Stückliste beträchtlich erhöht werden.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:italic; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Bitte beachten Sie, dass bei einer Änderung dieser Option die Stückliste komplett neu erstellt wird. Eventuelle Änderungen, die Sie von Hand gemacht haben gehen dabei verloren.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Hier können Sie Extraspalten für die Zusatztexte (Z1..Z4) ein- oder ausblenden

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Hiermit können Sie die Stückliste mit vertikalen Trennlinien versehen

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Hiermit können Sie die Stückliste mit horizontalen Trennlinien versehen

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Wenn Sie diese Option auswählen, so wird die Bauteilgruppe, die am häufigsten vertreten ist, als erstes in der Stückliste erscheinen. Alle weiteren Gruppen kommen danach ebenfalls in der Reihenfolge ihrer Häufigkeit vor.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Wenn Sie diese Option auswählen, so werden die Bauteilgruppen alphabetisch anhand ihrer Bezeichner sortiert.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Bestimmen Sie vor dem Ausdruck oberen und den linken Druckrand, damit die Stückliste nicht ganz an den Rand gedruckt wird.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Bestimmen Sie vor dem Ausdruck das Papierformat.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: können Sie die Stückliste direkt auf dem aktuellen Blatt einfügen:

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: können Sie die Stückliste als Textdatei exportieren:

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Mit dieser Funktion wird die Stückliste in die Windows-Zwischenablage kopiert. Von hier aus kann diese von jedem anderen Programm (z.B. Word) eingefügt werden. Da können Sie die Stückliste dann mit dem anderen Programm beliebig weiter bearbeiten.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Mit diesem Knopf können Sie die aktuelle Stückliste speichern. Die Stückliste wird im universellen "Rich-Text-Format" gespeichert und hat die Endung ".RTF". Dieses Format kann von den meisten Textverarbeitungsprogrammen gelesen werden.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Mit diesem Knopf können Sie eine bereits gespeicherte Stückliste wieder öffnen.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
